class testing.unit.test_selection.TestGlobGetNormalSf(methodName='runTest')[source]¶

Bases: testing.unit.UnitTestCase

Test glob parsing of the test_glob_get_normal_sf function. Indirectly test behaviour of glob_to_re.

exclude_glob_tester(path, glob_string, root_path='/')[source]¶
glob_tester(path, glob_string, include_exclude, root_path)[source]¶

Takes a path, glob string and include_exclude value (1 = include, 0 = exclude) and returns the output of the selection function. None - means the test has nothing to say about the related file 0 - the file is excluded by the test 1 - the file is included 2 - the test says the file (must be directory) should be scanned

include_glob_tester(path, glob_string, root_path='/')[source]¶
